name: To Hell and Back (itch) (atgeorge)
description:
Survive as long as possible in this hopeless, endless, zombie highway runner while being chased by the zombie horde.  Just keep in mind that in the Zombie Apocolypse, death is only the beginning.

Plays in resolution 576 x 1024 so you may want to run in fullscreen.

Also, the font and road prefab/material are premade assets that I forgot to credit in the original submission (just added here as a note)

Controls:

Left - A

Right - D

Credit:

Labyrinth of Lost Dreams by Darren Curtis | https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/

Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
